title: New Investigation (2025-04-19 22:34)
summary: Investigation of 10 problematic pods in namespace 'default'.

conversation.content: Based on my analysis of your Kubernetes cluster, I've detected 10 problematic pods including configmap-error, failing-job-2jdjm, failing-job-4ndjw, and 7 more. There are also 5 recent warning/error events that may indicate issues. I recommend checking the suggested actions below to investigate further.

The analysis reveals significant stability issues in the default namespace, with 22 pods experiencing various problems. The main issues include multiple failing containers with exit code 1, an OOM-killed pod with 191 restarts, storage-related problems (missing ConfigMap, PVC provisioning failures), and several pods failing readiness/liveness probes. There are also service configuration issues, with one service lacking selectors and another having selectors that don't match any pods.

data.summary: The analysis reveals significant stability issues in the default namespace, with 22 pods experiencing various problems. The main issues include multiple failing containers with exit code 1, an OOM-killed pod with 191 restarts, storage-related problems (missing ConfigMap, PVC provisioning failures), and several pods failing readiness/liveness probes. There are also service configuration issues, with one service lacking selectors and another having selectors that don't match any pods.
